alert.title: Possible Social Security Number Detected
alert.impact: Unauthorized disclosure of this information could lead to fraud, or identity theft.
Unauthorized disclosure could also lead to regulatory penalties.
alert.remediation: This should be investigated to identify the nature of the data matching the detection pattern. The root cause of a disclosure could be test data, a flat file database, or the triggering of some unexpected vulnerability.
alert.discussion: Vega has detected a numerical pattern matching the structure of a social security number in scanned content. This could be a false positive against a pattern with the same characteristics.
